short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple Browser-Extension that skips YouTube Ads if possible. If an Ad cannot be skipped, it will be muted.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Extensions skips and mutes ads for you. So if users like to mute their ads and skip them, they no longer have to click on the button, the extension will do this automatically. The extension only works for youtube.com urls.
